alert.note: Alert for Cabo Rojo; Guanica; Hormigueros; Lajas; San German (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 27 at 9:58AM ADT until October 27 at 12:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AST THIS MORNING FOR CABO ROJO, GUANICA, HORMIGUEROS, LAJAS AND SAN GERMAN COUNTIES... At 858 AM AST, Doppler radar and satellite images indicate that thunderstorms were producing heavy rain across the warned area, and a second round of heavy rain is rapidly approaching the area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and Satellite data. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...SATELLITE AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

area.areaDesc: Cabo Rojo; Guanica; Hormigueros; Lajas; San German
